# pixelFormat

**Instance Property**

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLPixelFormat] object associated with the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pixelFormat: NSOpenGLPixelFormat? { get set }
```

## Related Documentation

- **init(frame:pixelFormat:)**: Returns an `NSOpenGLView` object initialized with the specified frame rectangle and pixel format.

## Managing the NSOpenGLPixelFormat

- **defaultPixelFormat()**: Returns a default [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLPixelFormat] object.
